org.opentosca.toscana.retrofit

Class BlockingToscanaApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentosca.toscana.retrofit.ToscanaApi
      • org.opentosca.toscana.retrofit.BlockingToscanaApi

  • public class BlockingToscanaApi
extends ToscanaApi
    Some API calls do only return the confirmation, but the server is still working on the response. This class wraps these calls so that they only return when the server has finished processing. This is realized by polling the server state.
